column4: hello guys, i m looking for little help, i want to run fuser (command) with php to check somefiles if they are in use or not. but i can't run it because of permissions, i tried almost everything to make it possible so far but i failed badly,  any help ? please !
yes but i want to run it without sudo in php
what error do you get? your php installation could be running in a restricted/safe mode
